sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY (ID, TO_USER_NAME , FROM_USER_NAME , CREATE_TIME , MSG_TYPE , MSG_XML ) VALUES (#id#, #toUserName# , #fromUserName# , #createTime# , #msgType# , #msgXml# )

INSERT INTO WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY (ID, TO_USER_NAME , FROM_USER_NAME , CREATE_TIME , MSG_TYPE , MSG_XML ) VALUES (_nextval('WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY'), #toUserName# , #fromUserName# , #createTime# , #msgType# , #msgXml# )
SELECT _currval('WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY') as id
sqlMap.update: update WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY set TO_USER_NAME = #toUserName# , FROM_USER_NAME = #fromUserName# , CREATE_TIME = #createTime# , MSG_TYPE = #msgType# , MSG_XML = #msgXml# where ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from (select ID id , TO_USER_NAME toUserName , FROM_USER_NAME fromUserName , CREATE_TIME createTime , MSG_TYPE msgType , MSG_XML msgXml from WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY) t
select ID id , TO_USER_NAME toUserName , FROM_USER_NAME fromUserName , CREATE_TIME createTime , MSG_TYPE msgType , MSG_XML msgXml from WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY t order by sortid
select ID id , TO_USER_NAME toUserName , FROM_USER_NAME fromUserName , CREATE_TIME createTime , MSG_TYPE msgType , MSG_XML msgXml from WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY t where t.ID=#id#

select * from (select ID id , TO_USER_NAME toUserName , FROM_USER_NAME fromUserName , CREATE_TIME createTime , MSG_TYPE msgType , MSG_XML msgXml from WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY) t
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.delete: delete from WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY where ID in (select t.id from (select ID id , TO_USER_NAME toUserName , FROM_USER_NAME fromUserName , CREATE_TIME createTime , MSG_TYPE msgType , MSG_XML msgXml from WX_MSG_CHAT_HISTORY) t )
